chat_history.user: how to registered dsc in income tax portal?

chat_history.bot: Steps to use DSC on the Income Tax Portal: 1. Register DSC: - Log in to the Income Tax e-Filing Portal - Go to ‘My Profile’ → ‘Register DSC’ - Connect your USB token and select the certificate - Enter password and submit 2. For E-Filing: - While filing, select ‘Sign with DSC’ - Plug in token, choose certificate, and enter PIN/password - Click ‘Sign’ Make sure your Embridge Utility Tool is running: https://embridge.emudhra.com/ (Related to: Embridge Utility Tool)

chat_history.user: how to create a business. partner login

chat_history.bot: To register as a Capricorn Business Partner, follow these steps: 1. Visit the official registration page: Register as a Business Partner 2. Select the type of account you want to register. 3. Fill in your personal details – Name, Email, Mobile Number, and Date of Birth. 4. Enter your Address and PIN code. 5. (Optional) Provide your Organization Details – GSTIN and PAN, if applicable. 6. Verify your email through the OTP sent to your inbox. 7. Once verified, your login password will be sent to your registered email. You can then use these credentials to log in and start your journey as a Capricorn Business Partner.

chat_history.user: how to get old series of encryption/.PFX certificate.

chat_history.bot: To obtain your old encryption certificate in .pfx format or its serial number after expiry: 1. Login to the customer portal through this link: https://secure.certificate.digital 2. Go to the 'Encryption-PFX-Download' section. 3. As per IVG 2.0 guidelines, upload a 30-second video for verification. 4. Urgent download is a paid service. 5. Free processing may take up to 20 days.

chat_history.user: how to process for organization employee DSC

chat_history.bot: To apply for an Organization DSC, please select your organization type: 1. **Proprietorship**: - Proprietor’s PAN Card / Aadhaar - GST or Registration Certificate (if applicable) - Bank statement (last 3 months) 2. **Private Limited**: - Applicant PAN / Aadhaar - Certificate of Incorporation - Organization PAN - GST Certificate (if applicable) - Board Resolution / Authorization Letter - Bank statement (last 3 months) 3. **NGO/Trust/Society**: - PAN / Aadhaar of signatory - Registration Certificate - GST Certificate (if applicable) - Authorization letter signed by members Apply via: https://secure.certificate.digital/buy-digital-signature Step-by-step guide PDF: Organization DSC Procedure (PDF) (Related to: Organization DSC Application)
